attributes.action: Do not allow mandatory vaccines as a condition of employment
attributes.additional_details: The vaccine has been produced incredibly quickly and many people are still apprehensive due to unknown long term side affects. We do not know the long term side affects of this vaccine- this is a fact. No jab no job policies are discriminatory.  against human rights and should not be condoned.
attributes.background: Companies are starting to talk about implementing no jab no job policies whereby they can insist that new staff must have received the COVID-19 vaccine as a condition of their employment. This should not be allowed as it is discriminatory.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
